isis.stitle: VT 275 Engine Service Manual - Engine Electrical Components - Description of Engine Electrical Components - Engine Mounted - IAH Relay (Intake Air Heater)

svcproc.title: IAH Relay (Intake Air Heater)
svcproc.para: The intake air heater relay is the larger of the two relays. It is located under the dust cover, mounted to the ECM/IDM support bracket. The intake air heater relay controls the intake air heater which warms incoming air to aid cold engine starting and reduce exhaust emissions during warm-up.
